passage_text: Confidence votes 19. Beer does contain ethyl alcohol (ethanol). Beer is made from water, barley, hops, and yeast. The water and barley are mashed to produce sugars that the yeast metabolizes to produce ethanol. Beer yeast can produce alcohol levels from 2.5-18% alcohol by volume.

Directions. Place brats in a Dutch oven with onions and butter, cover the brats with beer. Bring to a boil and reduce to simmer until brats are cooked. Remove brats and set aside beer mixture. Grill brats until golden brown and return to beer mixture until ready to serve.

Beer does contain ethyl alcohol (ethanol). Beer is made from water, barley, hops, and yeast. The water and barley are mashed to produce sugars that the yeast metabolizes to pr … oduce ethanol. Beer yeast can produce alcohol levels from 2.5-18% alcohol by volume.

Place brats in a Dutch oven with onions and butter, cover the brats with beer. Bring to a boil and reduce to simmer until brats are cooked. Remove brats and set aside beer mixture. Grill brats until golden brown and return to beer mixture until ready to serve.

I put the whole brats in a dish and cover with beer and add the brown sugar and about 1 tsp of cayenne powder. I'll let that sit for about 12 hours, then transfer into the crock pot. Add peppers, onions, garlic and let it sit in the crock pot on low for a good 6 hours.
